TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DragCompletedEventHandler(object sender, DragCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DragCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The object where the event handler is attached.
Docs.summary: Represents a method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted"> routed event of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control.
